blog.name: pixiepokers
blog.title: Pixie Pokers
blog.description:
Pixie Poker Productions, a cosplay group from Denmark.
Don't feel shy about writing to us; ask whatever questions you may have, and feel free to follow up on what we're doing! Updates, as well as our videos and pictures can be found here.

summary: What if instead of trying to kill Harry Potter Voldemort took him
body:
What if instead of trying to kill Harry Potter Voldemort took him

I feel like Harry wouldn’t turn into their ‘father figure’ so like could ya imagine tho

V: HARRY WTF ARE U DOING???!?!?!?

H: I’m making cookies????

V: COOKIES ARE FOR GOOD PEOPLE!!!!!

…

…

V: Can I have one?

H: *slaps him* nO THERE HOT

summary: My new headcanon
body:
My new headcanon

Seamus and Dean are both pansexual and in an open, non-monogamous relationship. It all started with Seamus taking Lavender to the Yule ball (canon), where the three of them ended up basically going together (Dean found nobody to bring and Seamus didn’t let his friend be all alone).

Currently writing a fanfiction for that anybody interested?

blog.name: poshydraco
blog.title: *slytherin freak
blog.description:
leo • ♀️

!! will contain huge amounts of useless banter and over-excitedness !!

summary:
i wasnt thinking much of it but while i was playing hogwarts mystery one of the first years said 
"i mentioned harry potter in...
body:
i wasnt thinking much of it but while i was playing hogwarts mystery one of the first years said

“i mentioned harry potter in potions and snape threw a jar of pickled animal parts at me”

and then i thought

“THIS TAKES PLACE BEFORE HARRY POTTER GOES TO HOGWARTS SO THAT MEANS WHEN SNAPE DOES THAT ITS BC HES ANGRY ABOUT THE THING”

it was truly a remarkable moment. you should have been there.

blog.name: rainandhotchocolate
blog.title: Are you Sirius?
blog.description: ~~ Marauders era fanfiction ~~ anons tagged #rainandhotchocolate ~~  Masterlist!~~ Taglist on website tumblr

summary: Hii love may I ask for a Sirius one where a one night stand with the reader brings to a friends with benefits relationship. &...
question: Hii love may I ask for a Sirius one where a one night stand with the reader brings to a friends with benefits relationship. & Y/N has feelings for him from the start but Sirius startes catching them with time & soon it starts breaking both of their hearts seeing each other with other people on day & wrapped in each others arms heavy breathing on nights.
answer:
ctheA/N: Heheh I like this one – This is more of a sort of college AU situation – but still full of that fun ol’ wizard stuff. As always lmk if you wanna be tagged cause apparently I can’t finish up a fic in one part and there must be multiples whew

One Life Stand

Y/N woke up, head banging against her skull and stomach already flipping over inside herself. She groaned, wanting to turn over but a little worried that she might puke over her pillow and immediately regretting whatever amount of shots she probably had last night.

“Ughhh,” Another voice said next to her and she jumped, sitting up quickly before gagging slightly, and covering her mouth.

“No more noise, please and thank you” Y/N muttered, feeling extremely uncomfortable and suddenly, extremely naked. She pulled the covers over her breasts and turned to see who was laying next to her.

All she could see was curly black hair and tanned muscular back which she could remember wanting to pull her nails down. There was a large tattoo sitting between his shoulder blades of a wolf which had begun to stretch and move. Y/N screwed up her eyes, partially to avoid sunlight, and partially because a faint memory was coming back to her of that wolf tattoo and –

Sirius, Sirius bloody Black is in my bed. Merlin’s saggy beard.

She groaned internally, did I have to pick Sirius? Marlene was going to kill her, Lily was going to slap her senseless… but there was a little bit of memory coming back to her from the night before. Sirius slamming her up against a door, sloppy and covered in her bright red lipstick, pulling her hair and head sideways and kissing down her neck, her shoulders. Y/N had the sudden urge to moan a little with the memory of him lifting her up around his waist and lifting her skirt above her hips, grabbing roughly around-

“Hey- Y/N?” Sirius grumbled, pulling himself up and groaning, “Fuck, what did we drink last night”

“Apparently everything in sight”

Sirius chuckled before holding his head again and turning to face her. He grimaced, blinking furiously trying to find the source of his annoyance.

“Why on earth is that window open”

“Couldn’t tell you, unfortunately” Y/N mustered a smile, trying to find a way to sneak out of the bed without him seeing her fully naked form, again.

“Trying to sneak out there?” Sirius turned back to face Y/N who was now vaguely tangled in the sheets with one foot standing out and the other still stuck underneath the covers.

“What gave it away”

“Well, the butt in my face was a good hint unless you wanted round 2?” He winked and leaned over to cup Y/N’s ass and kissed down her leg. Y/N rolled her eyes and turned around, hoping to cover up any blush creeping up her chest.

“I need to go, Black”

“Back to the last name basis?” He pouted and leaned back again, placing his arms up behind his head. He watched as she pulled on her crop top and skirt, rolling up her tights with her foot up on the bed. She cracked out her back, and stood up awkwardly, brushing out her hair.

“So… I’ll see you around then”

“I’d be surprised if you didn’t, considering we are in the same classes”

“Well yes, that’s what I meant”

“Ok, well have a good… day”

“Are you ok?” Sirius was laughing softly, “you couldn’t get out of here faster”

“No, no sorry, I just, I honestly promised to meet Lily for breakfast this morning” Y/N was rambling, and very much wanted to leave already and get a large stack of bacon to soak up the alcohol still swishing around in her stomach.

“Ok, ok, well can I ask something at least before you go?”

“Well of course” Y/N picked up her purse and edged towards the door.

“Can I see you again?” Y/N stopped moving, a little floored by his question. Was he asking her out? Was she that good in bed?

“I – I don’t think that’s a good idea” Y/N smiled at him, trying to ignore her brain still pounding hard.

“And why’s that? You thought it was a good idea last night”

“We were drunk”

“Ah” Sirius’ face fell a little.

“And, Marlene has been into you since first year” Y/N said quickly, trying to fix the situation.

“Yeah, I had a sense, you know when she started sitting on my lap” Sirius chuckled, the smile not reaching his eyes.

“She’s not exactly subtle” Y/N grinned, one hand on the doorknob, “Ok, so… see you around?”

“See you round, Y/L/N”

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

“Where on earth have you been” Lily chirped, much too loudly for a morning post heavy drinking and song screaming.

“I was at home, just slept in” Y/N avoided her eye, sitting down at their favourite table at The Teapot, and smiling widely when she saw a plate of bacon being slid in front of her.

“Bless you!” Y/N grinned at Marlene who winked at her, Y/N suddenly remembered Sirius’ hands between her legs and looked away and tried to not somehow give away that she just slept with one of her closest friends’ crushes.

She stayed quiet for the remainder of breakfast, speaking only when Lily finally asked what was wrong with her and she mumbled a lame excuse about her hangover.

Marlene left early, running off to work at her cupcake bakery, telling them both to come by later so she didn’t want to shoot herself at 3pm when the afterschool crowd came by.

“Ok, what did you do?”

“What do you mean” Y/N made a face at Lily, swirling sugar in her coffee as it slowly got cold.

“Stop bullshitting me, Y/N, you’ve got that look on your face” Lily glared her down, her bright green eyes boring into Y/N’s forehead.

“What look!”

“The one you got when you accidentally threw up in James’ bathroom and didn’t know how to clean it”

“That’s very specific”

“Don’t change the subject, Y/N, where were you last night”

“I… went home with someone” Y/N cringed, Lily’s smile getting wider and wider.

“Did you now” Lily teased, laughing at Y/N bright red face. Suddenly, her bright green eyes became very wide, “Oh my GOD”

“What”

“You didn’t”

“What!”

“YOU SLEPT WITH SIRIUS” Lily shrieked, getting glares from the customers sitting around her.

“Shush!” Y/N growled at her, heart pounding and praying that Marlene didn’t miraculously appear at the doorway or hear Lily from across town, “How did you even guess that?”

“Oh come on, he was practically falling over you last night trying to flirt” Lily was laughing now, clearly enjoying Y/N’s discomfort.

“Please don’t tell Marlene” Y/N begged, “I’ll do anything”

“Anything?” Lily winked suggestively.

“I know you’ve been desperate to see what it would be like to sleep with me, but I think James would be mad”

“This is potentially true”

“So, you won’t tell her?”

“No, of course not” Lily shook her head, “But she wouldn’t care you know”

“Oh yeah, sure she wouldn’t”

“She wouldn’t! It didn’t mean anything anyway” Lily watched her closely, “Right?”

“Yes, yes nothing. I barely remember it” Y/N smiled at her, “but thank you.”

Y/N looked down, avoiding Lilys still pertinent gaze.

“So… you remember nothing huh?” Lily grinned widely, and Y/N shoved her lightly on the shoulder, “Ok I’m gonna go pay, you want a takeaway hot chocolate?”

“Of course,” Lily stood up and walked to the counter, chatting to the barista loudly to try and get a discount on her meal. Y/N watched her lean over the counter and laugh loudly, tucking her long red hair behind her ear. She couldn’t get her mind of those two shoulder blades lying on pale blue sheets, covered in small scratches made by her nails.

“What are you thinking about?” Lily came over grabbing Y/N’s coat and holding out a hand to pick her up.

“My final exam next week,” Y/N said quickly, taking her hand and grabbing her coat, slipping it on. Her phone buzzed in her pocket and she pulled it out to check whilst Lily was in front of her.

Sirius: Tonight? 😉

Y/N: I’ll see you at 7pm, don’t you dare tell James.

Taglist: @blackpinkdolan @blushingskywalker @maraudersandco @thebabblingbook   @cherrie511  @imlukesnirvana

“Apparently everything in sight”

Sirius chuckled before holding his head again and turning to face her. He grimaced, blinking furiously trying to find the source of his annoyance.

“Why on earth is that window open”

“Couldn’t tell you, unfortunately” Y/N mustered a smile, trying to find a way to sneak out of the bed without him seeing her fully naked form, again.

“Trying to sneak out there?” Sirius turned back to face Y/N who was now vaguely tangled in the sheets with one foot standing out and the other still stuck underneath the covers.

“What gave it away”

“Well, the butt in my face was a good hint unless you wanted round 2?” He winked and leaned over to cup Y/N’s ass and kissed down her leg. Y/N rolled her eyes and turned around, hoping to cover up any blush creeping up her chest.

“I need to go, Black”

“Back to the last name basis?” He pouted and leaned back again, placing his arms up behind his head. He watched as she pulled on her crop top and skirt, rolling up her tights with her foot up on the bed. She cracked out her back, and stood up awkwardly, brushing out her hair.

“So… I’ll see you around then”

“I’d be surprised if you didn’t, considering we are in the same classes”

“Well yes, that’s what I meant”

“Ok, well have a good… day”

“Are you ok?” Sirius was laughing softly, “you couldn’t get out of here faster”

“No, no sorry, I just, I honestly promised to meet Lily for breakfast this morning” Y/N was rambling, and very much wanted to leave already and get a large stack of bacon to soak up the alcohol still swishing around in her stomach.

“Ok, ok, well can I ask something at least before you go?”

“Well of course” Y/N picked up her purse and edged towards the door.

“Can I see you again?” Y/N stopped moving, a little floored by his question. Was he asking her out? Was she that good in bed?

“I – I don’t think that’s a good idea” Y/N smiled at him, trying to ignore her brain still pounding hard.

“And why’s that? You thought it was a good idea last night”

“We were drunk”

“Ah” Sirius’ face fell a little.

“And, Marlene has been into you since first year” Y/N said quickly, trying to fix the situation.

“Yeah, I had a sense, you know when she started sitting on my lap” Sirius chuckled, the smile not reaching his eyes.

“She’s not exactly subtle” Y/N grinned, one hand on the doorknob, “Ok, so… see you around?”

“See you round, Y/L/N”

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

“Where on earth have you been” Lily chirped, much too loudly for a morning post heavy drinking and song screaming.

“I was at home, just slept in” Y/N avoided her eye, sitting down at their favourite table at The Teapot, and smiling widely when she saw a plate of bacon being slid in front of her.

“Bless you!” Y/N grinned at Marlene who winked at her, Y/N suddenly remembered Sirius’ hands between her legs and looked away and tried to not somehow give away that she just slept with one of her closest friends’ crushes.

She stayed quiet for the remainder of breakfast, speaking only when Lily finally asked what was wrong with her and she mumbled a lame excuse about her hangover.

Marlene left early, running off to work at her cupcake bakery, telling them both to come by later so she didn’t want to shoot herself at 3pm when the afterschool crowd came by.

“Ok, what did you do?”

“What do you mean” Y/N made a face at Lily, swirling sugar in her coffee as it slowly got cold.

“Stop bullshitting me, Y/N, you’ve got that look on your face” Lily glared her down, her bright green eyes boring into Y/N’s forehead.

“What look!”

“The one you got when you accidentally threw up in James’ bathroom and didn’t know how to clean it”

“That’s very specific”

“Don’t change the subject, Y/N, where were you last night”

“I… went home with someone” Y/N cringed, Lily’s smile getting wider and wider.

“Did you now” Lily teased, laughing at Y/N bright red face. Suddenly, her bright green eyes became very wide, “Oh my GOD”

“What”

“You didn’t”

“What!”

“YOU SLEPT WITH SIRIUS” Lily shrieked, getting glares from the customers sitting around her.

“Shush!” Y/N growled at her, heart pounding and praying that Marlene didn’t miraculously appear at the doorway or hear Lily from across town, “How did you even guess that?”

“Oh come on, he was practically falling over you last night trying to flirt” Lily was laughing now, clearly enjoying Y/N’s discomfort.

“Please don’t tell Marlene” Y/N begged, “I’ll do anything”

“Anything?” Lily winked suggestively.

“I know you’ve been desperate to see what it would be like to sleep with me, but I think James would be mad”

“This is potentially true”

“So, you won’t tell her?”

“No, of course not” Lily shook her head, “But she wouldn’t care you know”

“Oh yeah, sure she wouldn’t”

“She wouldn’t! It didn’t mean anything anyway” Lily watched her closely, “Right?”

“Yes, yes nothing. I barely remember it” Y/N smiled at her, “but thank you.”

Y/N looked down, avoiding Lilys still pertinent gaze.

“So… you remember nothing huh?” Lily grinned widely, and Y/N shoved her lightly on the shoulder, “Ok I’m gonna go pay, you want a takeaway hot chocolate?”

“Of course,” Lily stood up and walked to the counter, chatting to the barista loudly to try and get a discount on her meal. Y/N watched her lean over the counter and laugh loudly, tucking her long red hair behind her ear. She couldn’t get her mind of those two shoulder blades lying on pale blue sheets, covered in small scratches made by her nails.

“What are you thinking about?” Lily came over grabbing Y/N’s coat and holding out a hand to pick her up.

“My final exam next week,” Y/N said quickly, taking her hand and grabbing her coat, slipping it on. Her phone buzzed in her pocket and she pulled it out to check whilst Lily was in front of her.

Sirius: Tonight? 😉

Y/N: I’ll see you at 7pm, don’t you dare tell James.

Taglist: @blackpinkdolan @blushingskywalker @maraudersandco @thebabblingbook   @cherrie511  @imlukesnirvana
trail.content:
ctheA/N: Heheh I like this one – This is more of a sort of college AU situation – but still full of that fun ol’ wizard stuff. As always lmk if you wanna be tagged cause apparently I can’t finish up a fic in one part and there must be multiples whew

One Life Stand

Y/N woke up, head banging against her skull and stomach already flipping over inside herself. She groaned, wanting to turn over but a little worried that she might puke over her pillow and immediately regretting whatever amount of shots she probably had last night.

“Ughhh,” Another voice said next to her and she jumped, sitting up quickly before gagging slightly, and covering her mouth.

“No more noise, please and thank you” Y/N muttered, feeling extremely uncomfortable and suddenly, extremely naked. She pulled the covers over her breasts and turned to see who was laying next to her.

All she could see was curly black hair and tanned muscular back which she could remember wanting to pull her nails down. There was a large tattoo sitting between his shoulder blades of a wolf which had begun to stretch and move. Y/N screwed up her eyes, partially to avoid sunlight, and partially because a faint memory was coming back to her of that wolf tattoo and –

Sirius, Sirius bloody Black is in my bed. Merlin’s saggy beard.

She groaned internally, did I have to pick Sirius? Marlene was going to kill her, Lily was going to slap her senseless… but there was a little bit of memory coming back to her from the night before. Sirius slamming her up against a door, sloppy and covered in her bright red lipstick, pulling her hair and head sideways and kissing down her neck, her shoulders. Y/N had the sudden urge to moan a little with the memory of him lifting her up around his waist and lifting her skirt above her hips, grabbing roughly around-

summary: Seamus's Secret Chapter 4
body:
Seamus’s Secret Chapter 4

Read on AO3

Summary: The start of sixth year is a whole new time for Seamus Finnigan. His best friend (and long time crush) Dean Thomas has started dating Ginny Weasley. While Seamus is jealous of their relationship, what hurts the most is not talking to Dean like he once did. Hopefully, Hermione and his other friends can distract him from his heartache.

Chapters: 4/?

Fandom: Harry Potter-J.K. Rowling

Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

Rating: Explicit

Category: M/M, F/M

Relationships: Seamus Finnigan/Dean Thomas, Seamus Finnigan/Blaise Zabini

Characters: Seamus Finnigan, Dean Thomas, Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley, Harry Potter, Ginny Weasley, Michael Corner, Blaise Zabini, Draco Malfoy, Theodre Nott, OMC

Additional Tags: Deamus, Eventual Deamus, bottom!Seamus, top!Dean, Bi!Dean, Gay!Seamus, Background Ronmione, Background Drarry, Fluff, Angst, Smut

Read on AO3

summary: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling
title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling
body:
“It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities”

Il n’y a pas de temps idéal pour lire Harry Potter, mais ayant lu pour la première fois ces livres à l’automne-hiver 2007, et ayant vu à de multiples reprises les films être diffusés pendant les vacances de Noël à la télé, j’ai fini par associer fin d’année et ma saga préférée. Il n’y a vraisemblablement pas de petit bonheur, et, à cette période, une chose que j’adore est de me réfugier dans ma chambre avec un bon plaid, une bougie, un chocolat chaud et un Harry Potter alors qu’il pleut des trombes à l’extérieur. C’est dans ce contexte charmant que je suis retournée dans La Chambre des Secrets. 



Qu’est-ce que ça raconte ? 

Après une première année mouvementée à Poudlard, Harry Potter s’ennuie à mourir chez son oncle et sa tante dépourvus de pouvoirs magiques. Pis encore, on essaie de l’empêcher de retourner dans la plus grande école de magie du Royaume-Uni ! En effet, une créature repoussante, qu’il apprendra être un elfe de maison, est venue le prévenir qu’il ne devait pas retourner à Poudlard, car un grand danger l’y menaçait. Bien décidé à retrouver ses amis et son foyer de cœur, Harry ne prête pas attention à cet avertissement. 

Et pourtant, sa deuxième année à Poudlard aura de quoi rivaliser avec sa première : Cognard déchaîné, professeur narcissique et égocentrique, un don pour parler aux serpents, une fête avec des fantômes, des araignées à tout va, mais surtout, la légende de la Chambre des Secrets qui refait surface. L’héritier de Serpentard parviendra-t-il à accomplir sa destinée, cinquante ans après que la Chambre ait été ouverte pour la première fois ? 


Cet opus de Harry Potter me faisait un peu peur quand j’étais petite : il faut dire que je n’étais pas très attachée aux serpents ni aux araignées, et donc en imaginer des spécimens gigantesques était moyennement ma tasse de thé, surtout avec l’imagination fertile de mes sept ans. Et pourtant, c’est aujourd’hui avec une nostalgie toute propre à mes premières lectures que je retrouve ces créatures. 

La Chambre des Secrets n’est pas mon Harry Potter préféré, peut-être parce que trop lu, trop vu, mais c’est toujours un bonheur de retrouver des passages que j’avais oubliés, de retrouver les doutes de Harry sur sa place chez les Gryffondors, ses exploits au Quidditch, de détester avec Ron le professeur Lockhart, de confectionner avec notre impertinent trio le Polynectar… 

Comme tout Harry Potter, La Chambre des Secrets apporte son lot d’actions, de mystères si bien ficelés, de monstres extraordinaires, de répliques cinglantes … qui me feront toujours un peu admirer J.K. Rowling pour son imagination incroyable. 


Vous voulez l’acheter ? J’avais repéré cette magnifique édition à la boutique 9 ¾ de King’s Cross, et j’ai commandé l’ensemble des livres sur Amazon.

reblog.comment:

Et pourtant, c’est aujourd’hui avec une nostalgie toute propre à mes premières lectures que je retrouve ces créatures. 

La Chambre des Secrets n’est pas mon Harry Potter préféré, peut-être parce que trop lu, trop vu, mais c’est toujours un bonheur de retrouver des passages que j’avais oubliés, de retrouver les doutes de Harry sur sa place chez les Gryffondors, ses exploits au Quidditch, de détester avec Ron le professeur Lockhart, de confectionner avec notre impertinent trio le Polynectar… 

Comme tout Harry Potter, La Chambre des Secrets apporte son lot d’actions, de mystères si bien ficelés, de monstres extraordinaires, de répliques cinglantes … qui me feront toujours un peu admirer J.K. Rowling pour son imagination incroyable. 


Vous voulez l’acheter ? J’avais repéré cette magnifique édition à la boutique 9 ¾ de King’s Cross, et j’ai commandé l’ensemble des livres sur Amazon.

trail.content_raw:
“It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities”

Il n’y a pas de temps idéal pour lire Harry Potter, mais ayant lu pour la première fois ces livres à l’automne-hiver 2007, et ayant vu à de multiples reprises les films être diffusés pendant les vacances de Noël à la télé, j’ai fini par associer fin d’année et ma saga préférée. Il n’y a vraisemblablement pas de petit bonheur, et, à cette période, une chose que j’adore est de me réfugier dans ma chambre avec un bon plaid, une bougie, un chocolat chaud et un Harry Potter alors qu’il pleut des trombes à l’extérieur. C’est dans ce contexte charmant que je suis retournée dans La Chambre des Secrets. 



Qu’est-ce que ça raconte ? 

Après une première année mouvementée à Poudlard, Harry Potter s’ennuie à mourir chez son oncle et sa tante dépourvus de pouvoirs magiques. Pis encore, on essaie de l’empêcher de retourner dans la plus grande école de magie du Royaume-Uni ! En effet, une créature repoussante, qu’il apprendra être un elfe de maison, est venue le prévenir qu’il ne devait pas retourner à Poudlard, car un grand danger l’y menaçait. Bien décidé à retrouver ses amis et son foyer de cœur, Harry ne prête pas attention à cet avertissement. 

Et pourtant, sa deuxième année à Poudlard aura de quoi rivaliser avec sa première : Cognard déchaîné, professeur narcissique et égocentrique, un don pour parler aux serpents, une fête avec des fantômes, des araignées à tout va, mais surtout, la légende de la Chambre des Secrets qui refait surface. L’héritier de Serpentard parviendra-t-il à accomplir sa destinée, cinquante ans après que la Chambre ait été ouverte pour la première fois ? 


Cet opus de Harry Potter me faisait un peu peur quand j’étais petite : il faut dire que je n’étais pas très attachée aux serpents ni aux araignées, et donc en imaginer des spécimens gigantesques était moyennement ma tasse de thé, surtout avec l’imagination fertile de mes sept ans. Et pourtant, c’est aujourd’hui avec une nostalgie toute propre à mes premières lectures que je retrouve ces créatures. 

La Chambre des Secrets n’est pas mon Harry Potter préféré, peut-être parce que trop lu, trop vu, mais c’est toujours un bonheur de retrouver des passages que j’avais oubliés, de retrouver les doutes de Harry sur sa place chez les Gryffondors, ses exploits au Quidditch, de détester avec Ron le professeur Lockhart, de confectionner avec notre impertinent trio le Polynectar… 

Comme tout Harry Potter, La Chambre des Secrets apporte son lot d’actions, de mystères si bien ficelés, de monstres extraordinaires, de répliques cinglantes … qui me feront toujours un peu admirer J.K. Rowling pour son imagination incroyable. 


Vous voulez l’acheter ? J’avais repéré cette magnifique édition à la boutique 9 ¾ de King’s Cross, et j’ai commandé l’ensemble des livres sur Amazon.

blog.name: cruciatuscrescendo
blog.title: Cruciatus Crescendo
blog.description: “I’m not trying to win. I’m not doing this because I want to beat someone, because I hate someone, or because I want to blame someone. It’s not because it’s fun. God knows it’s not because it’s easy. It’s not even because it works because it hardly ever does. I do what I do because it’s right! Because it’s decent! And above all, it’s kind! It’s just that… Just kind." Harrison|24|Ravenclaw|Non-binary|He/Him or They/Them

summary: Luna had decorated her bedroom ceiling with five beautifully painted faces: Harry, Ron, Hermione, Ginny, and Neville. They were...
body:
Luna had decorated her bedroom ceiling with five beautifully painted faces: Harry, Ron, Hermione, Ginny, and Neville. They were not moving as the portraits at Hogwarts moved, but there was a certain magic about them all the same: Harry thought they breathed. What appeared to be fine golden chains wove around the pictures, linking them together, but after examining them for a minute or so, Harry realized that the chains were actually one word, repeated a thousand times in golden ink: friends … friends … friends …

Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

blog.name: guardofcitadel
blog.title: VANITAS
blog.description:
Alice | Italy
“I had an inheritance from my father,
it was the moon and the sun.
And though I roam all over the world,
the spending of it's never done.”
